import { Component, Signal, computed } from '@angular/core'; import { User } from '../user.model'; import { UsersService } from '../users.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-users-account-details', templateUrl: './users-account-details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./users-account-details.component.scss'], }) export class UsersAccountDetailsComponent { constructor(private userService: UsersService) {} user: Signal = computed(() => this.userService.user()); placeholderImageUrl: Signal = computed(() => this.userService.imagePlaceholderUrl(this.user().name) ); }
